tool_description: Creates daily feeding schedule with multiple meal options based on caloric needs and food preferences.

feeding_times.description: Preferred feeding times in HH:MM format

treat_allowance.description: Percentage of calories allocated for treats (0-20)

error_messages: Invalid calorie target: Daily calories must be positive
Meals per day out of range: Must be 1-6 meals
Invalid food type: Primary food type not recognized
Too many food preferences: Maximum 10 preferences allowed
Invalid feeding time format: Use HH:MM format for times
Treat allowance out of range: Must be 0-20 percent
usage: Specify daily_calories, meals_per_day, and primary_food_type. Optionally add food_preferences, feeding_times, and treat_allowance for customized meal planning.

food_recommendations.description: Recommended food products for each meal
